title: Abyssal pearls

properties.value: Abyssal pearls are items obtained from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift. They are used to purchase items from Apprentice Felix's shop, Temple Supplies, in exchange for Runecraft related items.

Item ID26792

Abyssal pearls are items obtained from the Rewards Guardian after completing a round of Guardians of the Rift. They are used to purchase items from Apprentice Felix's shop, Temple Supplies, in exchange for Runecraft related items.

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).

'''Abyssal pearls''' are items obtained from the [[Rewards Guardian]] after completing a round of [[Guardians of the Rift]]. They are used to purchase items from [[Apprentice Felix]]'s shop, [[Temple Supplies]], in exchange for [[Runecraft]] related items.

==Item sources==
{{Drop sources|Abyssal pearls}}
